metadata.title: CVE-2022-4842 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw NULL Pointer Dereference in the Linux kernel NTFS3 driver functionattr_punch_hole() was found. A local user could use this flaw to crash thesystem.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
